website_summaries.verdict: The Davis Lace sneaker from the Chaco brand exhibits a good combination of functional and casual with its top-quality and performance. It keeps you looking stylish with its simple yet attractive outdoor0inpired design. Users enjoy the long-lasting comfort and breathability this low-top sneaker provides.
pros: The majority of the critics express in their reviews that the Chaco Davis Lace hugs the foot in exceptional comfort
Multiple users agree that the sneaker provides good arch support
This silhouette from Chaco offers proper ventilation for the foot that is great even on hot weather, according to a good number of wearers
Several purchasers say that the shoe feels lightweight on foot
Many users are delighted with how they can wear the Davis Lace sneaker all day without their feet hurting
The Chaco Davis Lace is great for both work and casual uses as a couple of reviewers express, like some low-top sneakers
cons: A few buyers have mentioned in their reviews that the laces of the Chaco Davis Lace are quite long
The canvas upper of the silhouette catches dirt easily, according to a couple of wearers

customer_reviews.title: A Great Compliment to Chaco Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I got these for when Chaco sandals might not be as appropriate. What I quickly found out was that these are much more versatile than I thought. These work with jeans, khakis, shorts, etc. They're a great all-around shoe, with classic style, and the great Chaco footbed. The true test came when I traveled with these. I wore them all over the place and walked several miles a day in them. They held up well and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice, versatile shoe . . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought the CHACO MENS DAVIS LACE LOAFER in a size 10 for my 20 yr old son to wear for college classes and general wear. He likes the fit and the support--- he prefers a more flexible sole. The shoe does seem to be a little more wide than others through the toe box and arch area. The heal seems to be a typical fit. The color and style are very versatile and go well with various clothing styles. They can be worn with or without socks--- I would recommend no show socks.
customer_reviews.author: TONYA

customer_reviews.title: Feel great- don't last
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for my husband about three months ago- according to him they fit great, very comfortable. He wore them around the house and at casual Fridays at work- nothing taxing, no heavy use. This morning he noticed a tear along the sole. I usually associate Chaco with having high quality, especially since I paid 90 bucks for these shoes. I could have spent 40 at an outlet mall for an off brand and gotten a comparable shoe that would have lasted longer. I hope this is just a manufacturing defect that doesn't affect other people because it really is a nice shoe- just can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these sneakers and says that they fit as expected. We live in a sub-tropical climate and these are just the right weight of fabric. We chose Chaco for their brand quality, and so far these sneakers are living up to that quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and they don’t make my feet look too big. I highly recommend. Only suggestion is to scotch guard them before you wear them.... they pick up dirt very easily. My son stepped on my foot and left a shoe mark. Other than that they are great! Well made, and comfy. I usually wear Birkenstock’s so to find a closed toe shoe is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mendelsohn

customer_reviews.title: A Gift that keeps on giving
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this gift has thanked me 3 different times for these shoes. They fit perfect and he loves these more than the higher dollar shoes he also received.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes in this style I've ever owned. VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: zjmoore1

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Chacos did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard from so many people how comfortable Chaco’s are, but didn’t realize until now exactly how much I’ve been missing out. These are incredibly comfortable, they look awesome, and the fit was spot on.

customer_reviews.text: If you want a supportive casual shoe that can be comfortable for hours, this is it!

product_meta.title: Chaco Men's Davis Lace Loafer
product_meta.description: Summer adventures await when you put on the Davis Lace shoes from Chaco®! Canvas upper with leather trim. Lace-up style with round, waxed cotton-poly blend laces and sturdy metal eyelets for a secure fit. Breathable canvas lining. Men's specific, removable LUVSEAT™ PU footbed for excellent underfoot support and comfort. Non-marking ChacoGrip™ with 15% recycled rubber compound materials. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Men's specific, removable LUVSEAT PU footbed
Round, waxed cotton/poly blend lace with metal eyelets
